p: The extraction yield of P. longiflora EO was 0.92 Â± 0.03%, which is in the range reported previously, with yields of 0.7 and 1.67, respectively [ 20, 21]. In general, the extraction yield of EO from oregano may vary from 0.1% to 3.0% depending on several factors including moisture content, plant type, morphology, and extraction conditions [ 22].
